officers.name: Ann Chwu
description: Hello, I’m Ann, but I also go by Pika! I’m a cognitive science major from ERC. I don’t have much preference when it comes to anime genres, so if you ever have a recommendation I’ll be glad to hear it. I also like to draw in my free time. I hope you have a fun experience with AME!

officers.name: Brian Gao
description: Hiya, I'm Brian, and I'm a general bio major at Seventh College. I'm a massive JoJo fan and I love fantasy, slice of life, and horror stuff (although good horror anime are so rare to find). Beyond anime I really like watching Youtube, Indie Animations, Western Cartoons and I love playing TTRPGs and drawing.

officers.name: Gwen Henrich
description: Heya, I'm Gwen! I'm a Biological Anthropology major at Revelle. I'm not too picky with anime genres, I'll watch anything if its interesting. That being said, some of my favorites are Blue Period, Mob Psycho 100, and The Case Study of Vanitas. I do also love a fair amount of video games, some of my favorites being The Witcher, Ace Attorney, Hollow Knight, Hades, along with Nintendo franchises and TTRPGs. Outside of that, I also really enjoy gothic and classical literature! With that being said, I hope you have a great time at AME!

officers.name: Jasmine Macy
description: Heiyo, I'm Jasmine. I'm currently majoring in Global Health. Within the club itself, I'm responsible for meeting minutes and planning our GBM events. I'm also in charge of AME's graphic design, having designed various flyers and the like.

I tend to love watching anime with interesting visuals and animation, especially from directors like Masaaki Yuasa and Hiroyuki Imaishi. Admittedly I'm more of a manga reader, and some of my top favorites include Dr. Stone, Berserk, and Dungeon Meshi.
Additionally I'm a huge fan of video games, and I'll be more than happy to chat about Pokemon, Fire Emblem, Persona, and many other things.
I hope you'll have a wonderful experience with Anime & Manga Enthusiasts! Feel free to contact any one of us officers for any comments and concerns ∠( ᐛ 」∠)＿

officers.name: Justus Vang
description: Yahallo! I’m Justus, currently a second year microbio major at 7th College! I watch anime on occasion, my favorite being Iroduku: The World in Colors. I do some gaming as well, mostly Genshin and various other gachas. Outside of that, I enjoy cooking, writing music, and swimming. With that out of the way, enjoy your stay in AME!

officers.name: Kaitlyn Chan
description: Hello! I'm Kaitlyn, though I also go by Kite (or Bite). I'm a data science major in Seventh. I enjoy watching hobby anime, most of which are card games.

officers.name: Melvin Pascual
description: Hola, My name is Melvin and I'm a third year Human Biology Major at Muir. A few things I like to do in my free time is play gacha games (Genshin Impact, Arknights, and Konosuba Fantastic Days), build gunpla, and dabble in a little bit of Sumo Wrestling. A fun fact about me is that I fluent in both English and Spanish, while also learning Japanese. As for anime, some of my favorites include Tsurezure Children, Gurren Lagann, Konosuba, In/Spectre, Oregairu (Yui is best girl !), ReLife, Macross F, Gundam Series, and Ansatsu Kyoushitsu. I have no set genre of anime that I watch so I am open to anything you may want to recommend me. If you see me at GBM feel free to come up to me and talk about whatever. I hope you enjoy your time here at AME!!!

officers.name: Nicolas Rodriguez
description: Hi there, my name is Nicolas but you can call me Nic. I am a political science major in Marshall college. As far as anime goes I like to watch pretty much anything and am always looking for suggestions if you have any. My favorites would probably be In/Spectre, JJK, Dororo, Rising of Shield Hero, and Kaguya-Sama. I also like to play lots of different kinds of games but I have been really into Apex if you ever need another person to play with. Besides those things I am a film buff, a runner, and someone who enjoys learning about different things, especially different cultures. I am also in the process of learning Japanese so if you ever wanna study together let me know, I could definitely use it. Hope you enjoy your time in the club and have fun finding a community for you!

officers.name: Owen Guan
description: I'm Owen, a 3rd year Bioengineer: Bioinformatics major in Sixth College. My favorite AMV series is Milgram and favorite manga is Frieren: Beyond Journey's End; I am also an avid Genshin player (Yoimiya and Ganyu main)!! Friend me on my MyAniList, HikikomoriCrisis!

officers.name: Sosuke Kojima
description: Konnichiwa, my name is Sosuke (pronounced like Sasuke but with an O), and I am a third year majoring in mechanical engineering. Being born and raised in Japan, I love it when animangas take inspiration from real locations in Japan, as it can feel nostalgic (especially Kyoto). Now to list the things I like: Rezero, Higurashi, Kaguyasama, Genshin, digital drawing, playing J-pop on piano, cycling and much more that I don't have the space to write.

officers.name: Tiffany Stanford
description: Hello! I’m Tiffany, a General Bio major at ERC. I’m a fan of good food related shows or slice of life series with some of my favorite manga being Dungeon Meshi, Blue Period, and Wotakoi. I also enjoy a couple of games such as Genshin Impact (Itto main!!) and Ensemble Stars. Other than that, I love drawing, crocheting, and cooking in my spare time. Hope you have a fun time in AME!
